Question: Maktar Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Maktar Inc.

Piconizer 4s

- USB 3 MFi Apple-certified storage device for iPhone 15 Pro/Pro Max
- Transfers 1GB videos in 13 seconds
- Features data lock function for enhanced external storage security
